synopsis.text:
Inca warriors reborn in modern-day Japan, Kyoji Miura and his kendo mentor, Masanari Tate, find themselves entangled in a centuries-old conflict that threatens the fate of the world. Once embroiled in a brutal civil war, the Incas unleashed a devastating mystical force that nearly annihilated the Earth. Now, Tate, the reincarnation of the Inca warrior Yawaru, seeks to harness this power once more to purge the world.

However, Kyoji, a reincarnated Inca warrior himself, refuses to let his friend and mentor bring destruction upon the world. With the weight of his hidden past and the responsibility to save the world resting on his shoulders, Kyoji embarks on a global journey to uncover the secrets of the ancient Inca civilization. Alongside Tate's fianc√©e, Kyoji must confront his former ally and embrace his destiny as the only one who can stop the cataclysmic force from being unleashed once again.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
